sources.title: Kickin' the Conga Round (1942)
sources.description: Shore leave in South America; Bluto muscles in on Popeye's girl, Olivia Oyla. Popeye muscles him out, but when they get to the conga club, he doesn't care to dance, so Bluto wins again. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/kickin-the-conga-round-1942/

metadata.Plot: Shore leave in South America; Bluto muscles in on Popeye's girl, Olivia Oyla. Popeye muscles him out, but when they get to the conga club, he doesn't care to dance, so Bluto wins again. But a fortuitous can of spinach fixes that, until the shore patrol has their own little conga line.
metadata.Actors: Margie Hines, Jack Mercer, Lee Royce
